text:
Deborah Anne Mazar Corcos (born August 13, 1964) is an American actress. She is known for playing sharp-tongued women. Her movie credits include in "Goodfellas" (1990), "Little Man Tate" (1991), "Singles" (1992) and "Lovelace" (2013). Her TV appearances include "Civil Wars", "L.A. Law", "Entourage" and "Younger". Since 2014, she has had a starring role in the Cooking Channel series "Extra Virgin" with her husband Gabriele Corcos.
Mazar was born in Jamaica, Queens, New York City. Her father was born in the Latvian SSR, Soviet Union, to a Jewish family, but raised Roman Catholic. During the 1990s, she dated actor Paul Reubens. She married Italian chef Gabriele Corcos in 2002. The couple have two daughters.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Mazar tested positive to COVID-19.
